divs: Sighting DetailsMy brother and I where in our backyard smoking and talking when I see a bright orange orb fairly low, it got brighter and dimmer then went out but you could still make out then went out of sight, We discussed how odd that was and was not like any plane or anything else i've seen before, then not a minute or so late I see a dark craft sort of gliding thought the air leaving a trail behind it. The craft was hard to make out even staring at right at it, the craft was extremely dark. We stood up and walked backwards keeping it insight for about 20 seconds then we lost sight of it. There was no Noise, No lights on the craft. Its seem sort of "Stealthy" to me. After that we sat back down then about 10 seconds later I spot out another Orange orb it does the same as the first one growing brighter the dimming out to where you can only make out the actual shape of the orb. I am not sure what to believe
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Norman
There was one other sighting in Norman on or around October 5th 2013
